name: GUARD-ROBOT
description: A Telegram Files Store Bot to protect your Files in Pyrogram by @TheTeleRoid

API_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org or @TeleORG_Bot

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org or @TeleORG_Bot

BOT_USERNAME.description: Your Bot Username which you sent to @BotFather (Without [@])

DATABASE_URL.description: MongoDB Database URI for Saving UserID for Broadcast.
